snippet: A new TV ad by Mitt Romney responds to claims by the Obama campaign that Mr. Romney presided over one of "the worst economic records in the country" while governor of Massachusetts.
abstract: A new TV ad by Mitt Romney responds to claims by the Obama campaign that Mr. Romney presided over one of "the worst economic records in the country" while governor of Massachusetts.

headline.main: Romney Ad a Response to Obama Attack
headline.print_headline: Back And Forth: Romney Ad Responds to Obama
